Let's schedule a web meeting to take another look.
For this meeting, we will need to have a Full Admin access to the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA) formally StealthAUDIT (SA) Server.
Please join from your Workstations to avoid any UAC issues on the Server Stealthbits is running on:
***NOTE*** The invite may not set the meeting reminder please adjust within your calendar once the Time is agreed on.
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.
It is recommended to use the Support Portal for appropriate communication channels. https://www.netwrix.com/sign_in.html?rf=my_tickets.html
Emailing into support@stealthbits.com has been disabled as well.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #437726 - DFS Server Not In Scan
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #437726 - - [EXTERNAL] DFS Server Not In Scan [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0MYtJz:ref ]
Per our call today we confirmed that the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Environment:
Will need to have fresh logs once the next scan completes
We updated the ADSscan host discovery
Will want to delete all the offline host that are no longer valid
Updated the DFS scan to one DC per
This updated the DFS host  list
We did not that the File server in question is part of the All win server no DCs yet it is not being scanned
Re-export the FileSystem parent folder once completed
The Zipped files can be uploaded directly to the case once logged into the following site expand the ticket number there, we will see an Attachment option.
Once the upload has completed reply to this email, so I know to pull the files.
Again, thank You for your time.
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.

Subject: [EXTERNAL] DFS Server Not In Scan [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0MYtJz:ref ]
Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.
To help us streamline the troubleshooting process and resolve your issue more efficiently, please provide the following information:
What is the impact of the issue on your business?
Who is affected by this issue?
What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken?
Is this a new configuration, data collection or report?
If no, has anything changed in your environment since the last time it worked?
Could we get the text output (copy&past) from the following ADMIN PowerShell ISE script block on the systems that are running Netwrix/Stealth Server applications?
Clear-Host  # Clears the console window for better readability.
#Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA) formally StealthAUDIT (SA) install path
#Netwrix Access Information Center (AIC) formally StealthAUDIT Access Information Center (AIC) install path
Please perform the follow steps and upload the resulting Artifacts:
From the NEA Console > Settings > Application
Rerun jobs that are failing to collect logs in full detail. Return Log level to warning afterwards.
Please provide logs from the following locations:
Logs from the jobs parent folder form the Export option. (ref: Jobs >> FileSystem)
From the Job Status Export the Messages Table, CSV is preferred:
REF: 0-FSDFS System Scans, 1-FSAA System Scans, etc
The Zipped files can be uploaded directly to the case once logged into the following site expand the ticket number there, we will see an Attachment option.
Once the upload has completed reply to this email, so I know to pull the files.
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.

It is recommended to use the Support Portal for appropriate communication channels. https://link.edgepilot.com/s/ab40dbab/xEtkck5ysEOxqJJN4npRUA?u=https://www.netwrix.com/sign_in.html?rf=my_tickets.html
Emailing into support@stealthbits.com has been disabled as well.

Per our call today we again noted the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Environment:
We now see that the 0-FSDFS System Scans is completing successfully and we have the missing file server reporting under the needed Flexential job group.
It is not clear as to why updating the FSDFS job to look at a DC rather than a list of host corrected the issue.
We Confirmed that there is data for the missing server within the FSAA Tables as well as within the AIC.
I will close out this ticket as we noted.
We have 30days to reopen once the closure email is received.
To reopen we can just reply to that email to bring the case back into my queue.
Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return.
Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link.
Again, thank You for your time.
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.
It is recommended to use the Support Portal for appropriate communication channels. https://www.netwrix.com/sign_in.html?rf=my_tickets.html
